sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ad( adindex, email, name, userid, phone, service, ment, rdate, status ) VALUES ( ad_seq.nextval, '$email$', '$name$', '$userid$', '$phone$', '$service$', '$ment$', sysdate , 'P' )
sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT adindex, userid, service, ment, sdate, edate, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, banner, DECODE(UPPER(status),'P','대기','N','거절','Y','완료') status, email, phone, name FROM ad WHERE userid IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rdate DESC) a )b WHERE rn between $s_no$ and $e_no$

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT adindex, userid, service, ment, sdate, edate, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, banner, status, email, phone, name FROM ad WHERE adindex = #adindex# ORDER BY rdate DESC) a )b
SELECT count(*) from ad where UPPER(status) = 'P'
select banner, status, service, adindex,sdate, edate from ad where upper(service)='U' and upper(status) ='Y'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ad SET banner = #banner#, status = 'Y' WHERE adindex = #adindex#
UPDATE ad SET status = 'N' WHERE adindex = #adindex#
